input2:
A patient w h/o gastroparesis who is interested in LINX placement. Seen in clinic, at which time Dr. pt to see Dr. given risk of worsening pt's gastroparesis surgery. 
Since that visit:
Saw Dr. were to re-eval. gastroparesis and confirm w pH impedance ON PPI. 
pH impedance:  score 51.4. 
Saw Dr. were weight loss (enrolled in Awaken 180 weight loss program), check gastrin off PPI, switched from prilosec to nexium. 
Letter from Dr. gastrin was normal. 

Subjectively, since last visit, pt has lost 16 lb. on the Awaken 180 program (in 3 weeks). His reflux is improved in both intensity & frequency but still taking protonix for 
"breakthrough symptoms" almost every day. Symptoms are acid regurgitation (mostly at night), substernal chest pain (day & night & also occurs completely unrelated to eating), and belching. States his symptoms are better but "not enough to satisfy me." Pt has been otherwise well. ROS only notable for stable chronic diarrhea.
